name: REVISION_HISTORY
documentation: Purpose Defines the notion of a revision history of audit items, each associated with the version for which that audit was committed. The list is in most-recent-first order.

items.name: items
items.documentation: The items in this history in most-recent-last order.

most_recent_version.name: most_recent_version
most_recent_version.documentation: The version id of the most recent item, as a String.

most_recent_version_time_committed.name: most_recent_version_time_committed
most_recent_version_time_committed.documentation: The commit date/time of the most recent item, as a String.
